about_the_game:
Do you like the music in Toru? Of course I liked it! You can return to the wonderful world of the game without even entering it; you just need to purchase this soundtrack, which consists of 14 different compositions. It includes themes of all the characters that convey their character and mood, explosive combat themes that charge you with energy, as well as music from all locations, each of which conveys a unique vibe!
Enjoy your listening (¬‿¬)
